mapper.sql: id, companyId, minNum, maxNum, name, beginTime, endTime, reg_time, remarks, status
mapper.select: select name from room where companyId=#{companyId};
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into room
companyId,
minNum,
maxNum,
name,
beginTime,
endTime,
reg_time,
remarks,
status,

mapper.update:
update room
companyId = #{companyId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
minNum = #{minNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
maxNum = #{maxNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
beginTime = #{beginTime,jdbcType=TIME},
endTime = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIME},
reg_time = #{reg_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=BIT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update room set companyId = #{companyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, minNum = #{minNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, maxNum = #{maxNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, beginTime = #{beginTime,jdbcType=TIME}, endTime = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIME}, reg_time = #{reg_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=BIT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
